title: Is there a substance that contains all elements in the periodic table? - Quora
tags: Is There Such a Thing as X?

response.answer_text: To simply put it the answer is no. But the reason behind that is because there are some elements that simply can not be found in nature and second there are so many rules and laws that dictate certain reactions that only a percentage of those elements would actually do anything. Even though it would be quite spectacular to witness it just won't happen in any case.
